褘字的基本解释

褘
huī
见“祎”。

褘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huī］
［《廣韻》許歸切，平微，曉。］
“袆1”的繁体字。
(1)绘有野鸡图纹的王后祭服。古礼规定在从王祭祀先王时所服。
(2)佩巾。佩于前身可以蔽膝，故也称蔽膝。
[②]［yī］
美。

褘字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　褘； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1121第17
【唐韻】許歸切【集韻】【韻會】吁韋切，?音暉。【玉篇】后祭服也。【禮·玉藻】王后褘衣。【釋名】王后之上服曰褘衣，畫翟雉之文于衣也。伊洛而南，雉靑質五色備曰翬，鷂翬畫鷂雉之文于衣也。　又【篇海】雨非切，音韋。【類篇】與幃同，囊也。【爾雅·釋器】婦人之褘謂之縭。【註】卽今之香纓也。褘邪交落帶繫于體，因名爲褘。　又【類篇】蔽膝也。【揚子·方言】蔽膝，江淮之間謂之褘，或謂之袚，自關而東謂之蔽膝。　又美也。【張衡·東京賦】漢帝之德，侯其褘而。　又【唐韻古音】與委通。【王應麟·詩攷】褘隋卽委蛇，出《韓詩內傳》。《漢衞尉衡方?》褘隋在公。　又音猗。人名。【前漢·王子侯表】安侯褘嗣。　又音鞠。【禮·玉藻】再命褘衣。【註】褘讀爲鞠。

Basic explanation of words
碆
huī
See "Yi".
碆
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huī]
["Guangyun" Xu Guiqie, Pingwei, Xiao. ]
"袆1" in traditional characters.
(1) The sacrificial costume of the queen with a pheasant pattern. The ancient ritual stipulates that it is obeyed when the king worships the ancestor.
(2) Wear towel. The predecessor of the wearer can cover the knees, so it is also called cover the knees.
[②]［yī］
nice.
碆
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　袆; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1121 Page 17
[Tang Yun] Xu Guiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Call on Wei to cut,? Yinhui. 【Jade articles】After sacrificial service also. 【Rite·Yuzao】The queen's coat. [Release name] The queen wears clothes called coats, and draws the text of Zhai pheasant on clothes. From Yiluo to the south, the five-color pheasant is prepared for the calligraphy, and the harrier draws the writing of the pheasant on the clothes.　[Pianhai] Yu Feiqie, Yinwei. 【Classes】The same as the curtain, but also the capsule. [Erya·Release Device] The woman's scorpion is called 缡. [Note] 卽今之香缨 also. The cross-falling belt of evil spirits is tied to the body, because it is called qi.　[Classes] Also cover your knees. [Yangtze Dialect] Blind knees, between Jianghuai and Huaihe is called "Zhou", or called "Zhou", from Guan to East is called "Blind Knee".　It's beautiful. 【Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu】The virtue of the Han emperor, Hou Qiqier.　[Tang Yun Ancient Sound] and Wei Tong. [Wang Yinglin·Poetry Research] Sui Sui Xu commissioned a snake, and published "Han Shi Nei Chuan". "Han Wei Wei Heng Fang?" Sui Zai Gong.　Yinyi again. Person's name. 【Former Han·Prince Hou Form】An Hou's heir.　Yinju again. [Li·Yuzao] Order the coat again. [Note] It is pronounced as Ju.
